classData.comment:
/**
     * Recursively creates a VNode tree suitable for direct DOM API insertion.
     * This tree excludes any nodes that are marked as 'moved' within the movedNodes map,
     * as their DOM manipulation will be handled by separate moveNode deltas.
     *
     * @param {Neo.vdom.VNode} vnode        The VNode to process.
     * @param {Map}            [movedNodes] A map of VNodes that are being moved.
     * @returns {Object|null} A new VNode tree (or subtree) with moved nodes pruned, or null if the root is a moved node.
     */
classData.description: Recursively creates a VNode tree suitable for direct DOM API insertion. This tree excludes any nodes that are marked as 'moved' within the movedNodes map, as their DOM manipulation will be handled by separate moveNode deltas.

params.description: A map of VNodes that are being moved.
params.name: movedNodes

returns.description: A new VNode tree (or subtree) with moved nodes pruned, or null if the root is a moved node.

classData.name: create
